attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are paying too much on fuel come on
be fair mr gordon brown & mr alistair darling lets see some changes from no10
dont you think you have punished us enough come on lets be a fairer britain
not rip off britain because thats what it is at the moment rip off britain and its always bang the motorist all the time come on lets see some changes

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
